description:
At last, the Appliyama 470 election results are revealed! Who will take #1? Who will be the new Nine Goddesses? Could Eri be one of them?! Meanwhile, Rei and Hackmon infiltrate L-Corp to investigate some mysterious video data!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sousenkyo Kecchaku! Eri ni Semaru Ma no Te!
The Election Results! Evil`s Clutches Reach for Eri!
総選挙決着! エリに迫る魔の手!
